.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Column extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.TypedOpenXmlLeafElement

summary.para: Column Width and Formatting.
This class is available in Office 2007 and above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is x:col.
